Interaction Design | Frontend Development

Hello, I'm Ela! I have a passion on creating a usable and useful products with recent technology. Interaction design and user experience are the things that interest me all the time.

Currently, I'm living in Stockholm to pursue a Master Degree in Interactive Media Technology at KTH Royal Institute of Technology. Previously, I worked for 3 years as a Frontend Developer at Varnion International in Bandung, Indonesia.

I spent my free time listening to music, watching movies (especially korean dramas), walking around Stockholm and taking some pictures!
